hero.title: The Complete Cannabis
hero.subtitle: Power your dispensary with AI-driven e-commerce, multi-language support, fraud protection, and complete business management—all in one platform.

features.heading: Everything You Need to Dominate Your Market
features.subheading: Built exclusively for cannabis retailers, WeedGo combines cutting-edge AI, enterprise-grade infrastructure, and industry-specific tools to help you
features.subheadingHighlight: sell more, serve better, and scale faster

aiBudtender.title: AI Budtender 24/7
aiBudtender.description: Never miss a sale. Your AI assistant handles customer questions instantly in any language, recommends products, and even verifies age automatically.

voiceShopping.title: Voice Shopping
voiceShopping.description: Accessibility meets convenience. Customers can browse, search, and order hands-free—perfect for in-store kiosks and mobile shoppers.

predictiveIntelligence.title: Predictive Intelligence
predictiveIntelligence.description: Know what sells before it happens. AI predicts demand, optimizes inventory levels, and alerts you to reorder at the perfect time.

smartRecommendations.title: Smart Recommendations
smartRecommendations.description: Boost average order value by 40%. Machine learning suggests complementary products based on purchase patterns and customer preferences.

unifiedCommerce.title: Unified Commerce Platform
unifiedCommerce.description: One system for everything—web storefront, in-store POS, kiosk, mobile app, and TV menu displays. Your inventory syncs in real-time across all channels.

brandedMobileApps.title: Branded Mobile Apps
brandedMobileApps.description: Your customers download YOUR app (iOS & Android). Build loyalty with push notifications, exclusive deals, and seamless mobile ordering.

selfServiceKiosks.title: Self-Service Kiosks
selfServiceKiosks.description: Reduce wait times and labor costs. Customers browse, order, and pay on tablets—your staff focuses on high-value interactions.

deliveryEcosystem.title: Delivery Ecosystem
deliveryEcosystem.description: Complete delivery management with driver apps, real-time GPS tracking, customer notifications, and route optimization. Compete with the big players.

multiLanguage.title: 25+ Languages, Zero Barriers
multiLanguage.description: Serve every customer in their native language. Auto-detection, real-time translation, and localized content—expand into any market instantly.

seoOptimization.title: SEO That Actually Works
seoOptimization.description: Dynamic, AI-powered SEO optimization. Your product pages rank higher on Google automatically—no SEO agency required.

fraudProtection.title: Fraud Protection Suite
fraudProtection.description: Stop chargebacks before they happen. AI detects suspicious patterns, blacklists fraudulent cards, and captures signatures for every transaction.

complianceAutopilot.title: Compliance Autopilot
complianceAutopilot.description: Stay compliant without the headache. Automatic age verification, CannSell tracking, OCS integration, and audit-ready reports at your fingertips.

ageVerification.title: Multi-Layer Age Verification
ageVerification.description: Voice recognition, ID scanning, facial matching, and manual override—verify customers' age through multiple methods for complete regulatory confidence.

businessIntelligence.title: Real-Time Business Intelligence
businessIntelligence.description: See everything in one dashboard—sales trends, top products, customer behavior, staff performance, and profit margins updated every second.

multiLocation.title: Multi-Location Command Center
multiLocation.description: Manage unlimited stores from one dashboard. Transfer inventory between locations, compare performance, and maintain consistent branding effortlessly.

customerLoyalty.title: Customer Loyalty Engine
customerLoyalty.description: Turn first-time buyers into regulars. Points programs, VIP tiers, birthday rewards, and referral bonuses—all automated and customizable.

brandCustomization.title: Your Brand, Your Way
brandCustomization.description: Complete white-label customization. Choose from premium templates or go fully custom—logos, colors, fonts, and layouts that scream YOU.

noCodeCustomization.title: No-Code Customization
noCodeCustomization.description: Change anything without a developer. Drag-and-drop page builder, custom forms, promotional banners—update your store in minutes, not weeks.

uptimeGuarantee.title: 99.9% Uptime Guarantee
uptimeGuarantee.description: Enterprise cloud infrastructure that scales automatically. Lightning-fast load times, global CDN, and redundant backups—your store never goes down.

apiArchitecture.title: API-First Architecture
apiArchitecture.description: Integrate with anything. Full REST API access lets you connect accounting software, marketing tools, or custom applications seamlessly.

cta.heading: Ready to See What WeedGo Can Do for Your Business?
cta.description: Join hundreds of cannabis retailers who've already made the switch.
cta.descriptionHighlight: Start free, scale unlimited, and transform your business
cta.descriptionEnd: with the only platform built specifically for you.

items.title: Manager, Urban Leaf Co.

items.quote: Scaling from 1 to 8 locations was seamless with WeedGo. The multi-tenant architecture and centralized management tools are exactly what we needed.
items.name: Lisa Rodriguez
items.title: CEO, Cannabis Collective
